name: Terry's Journey
description:
Join Terry, the finest swordsman in the world, and his companions on a quest through a strange land called Kanto, where cute but vicious monsters plague the wilderness. Search for Milayou, Terry's sister, who has once again disappeared in the night, and discover unusual treasures called Dragon Balls in her pursuit.

[TIP: Talk to everyone twice. Most NPCs will have extra dialogue, sometimes helpful and occasionally funny. Also, check every object you can. You never know what you will find!]
